casebody.data:
INTERNATIONAL UNION OF PAINTERS & ALLIED TRADES, DISTRICT COUNCIL NO. 4, etc., et al., Respondents,
v.
NEW YORK STATE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR, et al., Appellants. Motion No: 2017-1114 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on December 12, 2017

Motion by New York State Building & Construction Trades Council, AFL-CIO for leave to appear amicus curiae on the appeal herein granted only to the extent that the proposed brief is accepted as filed. The brief must be submitted in digital format within seven days.
